artist: Larsen Design Studio; Katsuji Wakisaka; Gessner A G; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Warp printed & woven. Chintz finish.  3 puffy plumes repeated in staggered rows.  Vert. rpt. 29"; horiz. 50.5". Warp printed & woven in Switzerland, chintz finish. title: Steppeflower
